metadata.synopsis: Player throws Boo at an enemy and yells out
metadata.how_to_trigger: Recruit MinscSummon Boo familiarThrow Boo at an enemy

0.speaker: Player
0.context: NodeContext: Gale: 'Pete Oculos' is latin for 'go for the eyes'. /ˈpe.te/, [ˈpɛt̪ɛ]. oculōs has a short o at the start and a long one at the end.

1.speaker: Player
1.context: NodeContext: Repeated barks every time Minsc throws Boo at an enemy.
